name: 7 Days (rajbunty)
description: A deadly virus has been unleashed and the whole city got infected by it. The reason behind it is still unknown. After destroying the main city, all zombies are coming to the neighbouring city Agarmantha. The whole city already got evacuated. All zombies will reach Agarmantha in 7 days. A scientist invented a suit to fight zombies and a magneto gun to kill them and save the world from this apocalypse. But will he be able to survive for 7 days and kill all the zombies?
